info.title: Databento Historical API - Timeseries Get Range
info.description: API for Databento's timeseries.get_range endpoint providing access to historical market data.

get.summary: Get historical timeseries data for a date range
get.description: Retrieves historical market data for specified symbols within a date range in CSV format.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: The dataset identifier for the market data source (e.g., XNAS.ITCH, XCHI.ITCH, DBEQ.BASIC)

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The data schema type (trades, mbp-1, mbp-10, ohlcv-1s, ohlcv-1m, ohlcv-1h, ohlcv-1d)

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of symbols to retrieve data for (max 100 symbols)

parameters.name: map_symbols
parameters.description: Whether to map instrument IDs to human-readable symbols

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return (1-1000000)

parameters.name: pretty_px
parameters.description: Whether to format prices as human-readable decimals

parameters.name: pretty_ts
parameters.description: Whether to format timestamps as human-readable ISO 8601 strings

200.description: Successful response containing historical market data in CSV format

schema.description: CSV data with schema-specific columns and header row

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or rate limit exceeded

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

basicAuth.description: HTTP Basic Authentication using Databento API key as username and empty password. Format: Authorization: Basic base64(api_key:)

error.description: Error code identifying the type of error

path.description: The API path where the error occurred

retry_after.description: Seconds to wait before retrying (for rate limit errors)

TradeRecord.description: Individual trade execution record for trades schema

ts_recv.description: Timestamp when record was received (UTC nanoseconds)

action.description: Action type: A=Add/Quote, M=Modify, D=Delete/Cancel, T=Trade

side.description: Trade side: B=Buy/Bid, A=Ask/Sell, N=None/Not applicable

MBPRecord.description: Market by Price record for mbp-1 or mbp-10 schema

ts_recv.description: Timestamp when record was received (UTC nanoseconds)

action.description: Market data action: A=Add/Quote, M=Modify, D=Delete/Cancel, T=Trade

side.description: Order side: B=Buy/Bid, A=Ask/Sell, N=None/Not applicable

OHLCVRecord.description: OHLCV bar data record for ohlcv-* schema types
